summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account, detailing significant withdrawals and service charges during November 2018. It highlights a large funds transfer of $2,500,000.00, indicating potential financial activities relevant to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account details.

events.title: Funds Transfer
events.description: A significant funds transfer of $2,500,000.00 was made from the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3 St, Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $2,503,667.84 as of November 1, 2018.
A funds transfer of $2,500,000.00 occurred on November 20, 2018.
The ending balance of the account as of November 30, 2018, was $3,667.84.
Service charges of $50.00 were incurred during the statement period.
The document contains confidential information and is subject to legal protections.
